item.description: Sometimes, the truth of a platitude rushes in and fills our thoughts like a flood on a dry riverbed. For example, everyone who’s been there will tell you, “Having kids changes everything,” but until you have children, the undeniable reality of that easy phrase doesn’t quite sink in.
